com.sterlingcommerce.ui.web.framework.presentation.data

Class SCUIDataConversionManager<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sterlingcommerce.ui.web.framework.presentation.data.SCUIDataConversionManager<T>

  • public class SCUIDataConversionManager<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    Manager class which keeps various convertors, ISCUIDataConvertor, against their name identifiers.

    This class also provides method to determine if there are any convertors registered for a given identifier and apply those convertors.

    asmishra T the type for the input/output data

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int FIRST
      Priority indicating that the convertor registered with this value should be called first.
      static int INTERMEDIATE
      Priority indicating that the convertor registered with this value should be called after first.
      static int LAST
      Priority indicating that the convertor registered with this value should be called last.

    • Method Detail

      • registerConvertor

        public void registerConvertor(ISCUIDataConvertor<T> convertor,
                              java.lang.String name,
                              int priority)
        Utility method to register a convertor for a name.
        Usage: Name can be the xpath for element conversion in case of XAPI to JSON conversion name The identifier for which the convertor has to be registered convertor The actual convertor implementation priority The priority with which the convertor needs to be registered. Priority value should be one of the following:
        • FIRST
        • INTERMEDIATE
        • LAST

      • applyConvertors

        public T applyConvertors(java.lang.String name,
                         T input,
                         SCUIContext uiContext)
        Utility method which applies all the registered convertors on the given input and returns the converted value. name The name with which the convertors have been registered input The input to be converted uiContext The current UI context The converted value, or the original input if no convertors have been registered

      • hasConvertorsRegistered

        public boolean hasConvertorsRegistered(java.lang.String name)
        Utility method to check if a convertor is registered for given name. name true if a convertor is registered for this name else false
